resources.string: Earth is a great planet. It\'s the home of the human race and it is very green with water.
Mars is the red planet. It may or may not have a reactor on it.
Mercury is a planet in the solar system. It is a really great place to visit. I love taking photos there.
Venus is a planet in the solar system. It is a really great place to visit. I love taking photos there.
Jupiter is a planet in the solar system. It is a really great place to visit. I love taking photos there.
Saturn is a planet in the solar system. It is a really great place to visit. I love taking photos there.
Uranus is a planet in the solar system. It is a really great place to visit. I love taking photos there.
Neptune is a planet in the solar system. It is a really great place to visit. I love taking photos there.
Pluto is a planet in the solar system. It is a really great place to visit. I love taking photos there.
